valid : (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).2
I : Set α
hI : I ⊆ (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).1.toMatroid.E
linearlyI :
  I ⊆ (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).1.X ∪ (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).1.Y ∧
    LinearIndepOn Z2 (Matrix.transpose fun x => (1 ◫ (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).1.B) x ∘ Subtype.toSum)
      (Subtype.val ⁻¹' I)
⊢ (True ∧
      LinearIndepOn Z2 (Matrix.transpose fun x => (1 ◫ Sₗ.B) x ∘ Subtype.toSum) (Subtype.val ⁻¹' (I ∩ (Sₗ.X ∪ Sₗ.Y)))) ∧
    (True ∧
        LinearIndepOn Z2 (Matrix.transpose fun x => (1 ◫ Sᵣ.B) x ∘ Subtype.toSum)
          (Subtype.val ⁻¹' (I ∩ (Sᵣ.X ∪ Sᵣ.Y)))) ∧
      I ⊆ Sₗ.X ∪ Sₗ.Y ∪ (Sᵣ.X ∪ Sᵣ.Y)

α : Type
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
X Y : Set α
Q : Matrix ↑X ↑Y ℚ
x' y₀ y₁ : α
hQ : Q.IsTotallyUnimodular
hx' : x' ∈ X
hy₀ : y₀ ∈ Y
hy₁ : y₁ ∈ Y
hyy : y₀ ≠ y₁
hQy₀ : Q ⟨x', hx'⟩ ⟨y₀, hy₀⟩ = 1
hQy₁ : Q ⟨x', hx'⟩ ⟨y₁, hy₁⟩ = 1
hQy : ∀ (y : ↑Y), ↑y ≠ y₀ ∧ ↑y ≠ y₁ → Q ⟨x', hx'⟩ y = 0
⊢ let c₀ := fun j => Q (⋯.elem j) ⟨y₀, hy₀⟩;
  let c₁ := fun j => Q (⋯.elem j) ⟨y₁, hy₁⟩;
  let Q' := Q.submatrix ⋯.elem ⋯.elem;
  (Q' ◫ ▮c₀ ◫ ▮c₁ ◫ ▮(c₀ - c₁)).IsTotallyUnimodular

    |[=true|do
            let y ← LWE_Distr n m p inst✝ errSamp

spec : OracleSpec ι
inst✝ : (i : ι) → SelectableType (spec.range i)
qc : ι → ℕ
j : ι
js : List ι
⊢ (do
      let x ← replicate (qc j) ($ᵗspec.range j)
      forIn js (QuerySeed.addValues x fun x => []) fun j r =>
          replicate (qc j) ($ᵗspec.range j) >>= pure ∘ fun a => ForInStep.yield (QuerySeed.addValues a r)) =
    do
    let _ ← replicate (qc j) ($ᵗspec.range j)
    forIn js (fun x => []) fun j r =>
        replicate (qc j) ($ᵗspec.range j) >>= pure ∘ fun a => ForInStep.yield (QuerySeed.addValues a r)

case append_singleton
ι : Type

spec : OracleSpec ι
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → SelectableType (spec.range i)

js✝ : List ι

j : List ι
js : ι
hjs :
  ∀ seed ∈ support (OracleComp.generateSeed ι inst✝² spec inst✝¹ qc j),
    [=seed|OracleComp.generateSeed ι inst✝² spec inst✝¹ qc j] =
      1 / ↑(List.map (fun j => Fintype.card (spec.range j) ^ qc j) j).prod
seed : spec.QuerySeed

⊢ [=seed|do
      let a ←
        List.foldlM
            (fun b a =>
              match b with
              | ForInStep.yield b =>
                (fun a_1 => ForInStep.yield (QuerySeed.addValues a_1 b)) <$> replicate (qc a) ($ᵗspec.range a)
              | ForInStep.done b => pure (ForInStep.done b))
            (ForInStep.yield fun x => []) j
      ForInStep.value <$>
          match a with
          | ForInStep.yield b =>
            (fun a => ForInStep.yield (QuerySeed.addValues a b)) <$> replicate (qc js) ($ᵗspec.range js)
          | ForInStep.done b => pure (ForInStep.done b)] =
    ((List.map (Nat.cast ∘ fun j => Fintype.card (spec.range j) ^ qc j) j).prod *
        ↑(Fintype.card (spec.range js)) ^ qc js)⁻¹

inst✝¹ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yₗ)
inst✝ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yᵣ)

Bᵣ' : Matrix ↑Xᵣ ↑Yᵣ ℚ
hBₗ'✝ : Bₗ'.IsTotallyUnimodular
hBᵣ'✝ : Bᵣ'.IsTotallyUnimodular
hXX : Xₗ ∩ Xᵣ = x₀ ᕃ x₁ ᕃ {x₂}
hYY : Yₗ ∩ Yᵣ = y₀ ᕃ y₁ ᕃ {y₂}
hBₗ' :
  (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3mems ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
    (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3mems ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁
hBᵣ' :
  (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3mems ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
    (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3mems ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁
⊢ match hXX.inter3all with
  | ((x₀ₗ, x₁ₗ, x₂ₗ), x₀ᵣ, x₁ᵣ, x₂ᵣ) =>
    match hYY.inter3all with
    | ((y₀ₗ, y₁ₗ, y₂ₗ), y₀ᵣ, y₁ᵣ, y₂ᵣ) =>
      let Bₗ := Bₗ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;
      let Bᵣ := Bᵣ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ;
      let D₀ᵣ := Bᵣ.submatrix2x2 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      let Dₗ := Bₗ.submatrix2x7 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ y₁ y₂;
      let Dᵣ := Bᵣ.submatrix7x2 x₀ x₁ x₂ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      (Bᵣ.drop1row2cols x₂ y₀ y₁ ◫ (⊞ Dₗ D₀ᵣ(Dᵣ * D₀ᵣ⁻¹ * Dₗ)Dᵣ).submatrix mapX mapY).IsTotallyUnimodular

F : List Formula

_in_H : (F, δ) ∈ H α

          ∃ Y_1 ∈ endNodesOf (next Y a),

                ∃ F γ,

    ∀ {X : Type u} [inst : TopologicalSpace X] (S : Set X), (∀ x ∈ S, ∃ U, IsOpen U) → IsOpen S

⊢ (∀ {X : Type u} [inst : TopologicalSpace X] (S : Set X), (∀ x ∈ S, ∃ U, IsOpen U) → IsOpen S) →
    ∀ {α : Type u} [inst : TopologicalSpace α] {s : Set α}, (∀ x ∈ s, ∃ t, IsOpen t ∧ x ∈ t) → IsOpen s

⊢ (∀ {α : Type u} [inst : DecidableEq α] {x : FreeGroup α}, x ≠ 1 → ¬IsOfFinOrder x) →
    ∀ {G : Type u} [inst : Group G], FreeGroup G → ∀ (g : G), g ≠ 1 → orderOf g = 0

⊢ (∀ {G : Type u} [inst : Group G], FreeGroup G → ∀ (g : G), g ≠ 1 → orderOf g = 0) →
    ∀ {α : Type u} [inst : DecidableEq α] {x : FreeGroup α}, x ≠ 1 → ¬IsOfFinOrder x

⊢ (∀ {m n : ℕ}, 0 < m → 0 < n → m.gcd n = 1 → ∀ N > m * n, ∃ x y, N = m * x + n * y) →
    ∀ (a b : ℕ), a > 0 → b > 0 → a.Coprime b → ∃ m, ∀ N > m, ∃ x y, N = a * x + b * y

⊢ (∀ (a b : ℕ), a > 0 → b > 0 → a.Coprime b → ∃ m, ∀ N > m, ∃ x y, N = a * x + b * y) →
    ∀ {m n : ℕ}, 0 < m → 0 < n → m.gcd n = 1 → ∀ N > m * n, ∃ x y, N = m * x + n * y

p : ℕ
prime : Fact (Nat.Prime p)
n k : ℕ
env : Environment (F p)
x_var : Var field (F p)
x : field (F p)
h_input : Expression.eval env x_var = x
h_assumptions : ZMod.val x < 2 ^ n
h_holds :
  match
    (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
          (fun bit =>
            StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
              (PUnit.unit,
                { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                  withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
          (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance) (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
          { offset := k + n,
            withLength :=
              (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                  if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.offset,
    (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
          (fun bit =>
            StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
              (PUnit.unit,
                { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                  withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
          (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance) (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
          { offset := k + n,
            withLength :=
              (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                  if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.withLength,
    (Equality.circuit id).to_subcircuit
      (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
            (fun bit =>
              StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
                (PUnit.unit,
                  { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                    withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
            (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance)
              (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
            { offset := k + n,
              withLength :=
                (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                  Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                    if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.offset
      (x_var, Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0) with
  | m, Operations.empty .(m), s =>
    Expression.eval env x_var =
      Expression.eval env (Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0)
  | x, x_1, s =>
    Circuit.constraints_hold.soundness env
        (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
              (fun bit =>
                StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
                  (PUnit.unit,
                    { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                      withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
              (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance)
                (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
              { offset := k + n,
                withLength :=
                  (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                    Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                      if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.withLength ∧
      Expression.eval env x_var =
        Expression.eval env (Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0)
⊢ ∀ i < n, env.get (k + i) = if (ZMod.val x).testBit i = true then 1 else 0

          (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance) (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
          { offset := k + n,
            withLength :=
              (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                  if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.offset,
    (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
          (fun bit =>
            StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
              (PUnit.unit,
                { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                  withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
          (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance) (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
          { offset := k + n,
            withLength :=
              (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                  if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.withLength,
    (Equality.circuit id).to_subcircuit
      (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
            (fun bit =>
              StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
                (PUnit.unit,
                  { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                    withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
            (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance)
              (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
            { offset := k + n,
              withLength :=
                (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                  Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                    if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.offset
      (x_var, Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0) with
  | m, Operations.empty .(m), s =>
    Expression.eval env x_var =
      Expression.eval env (Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0)
  | x, x_1, s =>
    Circuit.constraints_hold.completeness env
        (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
              (fun bit =>
                StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
                  (PUnit.unit,
                    { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                      withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
              (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance)
                (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
              { offset := k + n,
                withLength :=
                  (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                    Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                      if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.withLength ∧
      Expression.eval env x_var =
        Expression.eval env (Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0)

    | ((y₀ₗ, y₁ₗ, y₂ₗ), y₀ᵣ, y₁ᵣ, y₂ᵣ) =>
      let Bₗ := Bₗ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;
      let Bᵣ := Bᵣ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ;
      let D₀ := Bᵣ.D₀ x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      let Dₗ := Bₗ.Dₗ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;
      let Dᵣ := Bᵣ.Dᵣ x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
          (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁ →
        (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
            (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁ →
          (Bᵣ.Aᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ ◫ (⊞ Dₗ D₀(Dᵣ * D₀⁻¹ * Dₗ)Dᵣ).submatrix mapX mapY).IsTotallyUnimodular

Xₗ Yₗ Xᵣ Yᵣ : Set α
x₀ x₁ x₂ y₀ y₁ y₂ : α
inst✝³ : (x : α) → Decidable (x ∈ Xₗ)
inst✝² : (x : α) → Decidable (x ∈ Xᵣ)
inst✝¹ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yₗ)
inst✝ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yᵣ)

hYY : Yₗ ∩ Yᵣ = y₀ ᕃ y₁ ᕃ {y₂}
⊢ match hXX.inter3all with
  | ((x₀ₗ, x₁ₗ, x₂ₗ), x₀ᵣ, x₁ᵣ, x₂ᵣ) =>
    match hYY.inter3all with
    | ((y₀ₗ, y₁ₗ, y₂ₗ), y₀ᵣ, y₁ᵣ, y₂ᵣ) =>
      let Bₗ := Bₗ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;
      let Bᵣ := Bᵣ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ;
      let D₀ := Bᵣ.D₀ x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      let Dₗ := Bₗ.Dₗ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;
      let Dᵣ := Bᵣ.Dᵣ x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
          (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁ →
        (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
            (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁ →
          (Bᵣ.Aᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ ◫ matrix3sumBottomLeft x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ Dₗ D₀ Dᵣ).IsTotallyUnimodular

Bₗ : Matrix ↑Xₗ ↑Yₗ ℚ
Bᵣ : Matrix ↑Xᵣ ↑Yᵣ ℚ
hXX : Xₗ ∩ Xᵣ = x₀ ᕃ x₁ ᕃ {x₂}
hYY : Yₗ ∩ Yᵣ = y₀ ᕃ y₁ ᕃ {y₂}
hBₗ : Bₗ.IsTotallyUnimodular

⊢ ∀ (j : ↑(Yₗ \ {y₂})),

n : ℕ

n : ℕ
net : AsymmetricHopfieldNetwork n
x : HopfieldState n
k : ℕ
h_k_lt_n : k < n
nextIndex : Fin n := ⟨k % n, ⋯⟩
x' : HopfieldState n := updateStateAsym net.weights net.thresholds x nextIndex
i' : Fin n := nextIndex
i'' : Fin n := ⟨(k + 1) % n, ⋯⟩
h_case1 :
  ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x' i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x' j).toReal -
      ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x j).toReal =
    (∑ j : Fin n,
        (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x' i' > 0 then 1 else -1) *
          if j = i' then updatedSpinValue net x i' else (x j).toReal) -
      ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x j).toReal
Δ₁ : ℝ
h_Δ₁ :
  ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x' i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x' j).toReal -
      ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x j).toReal =
    Δ₁
Δ₂ : ℝ
h_Δ₂ :
  ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i'' j * if localFieldAsym net x' i'' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x' j).toReal -
      ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i'' j * (x i'').toReal * (x j).toReal =
    Δ₂
Δ₃ : ℝ
h_Δ₃ :
  (∑ i : Fin n,
      if i ≠ i' ∧ i ≠ i'' then
        ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i j * (x' i).toReal * (x' j).toReal -
          ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i j * (x i).toReal * (x j).toReal
      else 0) =
    Δ₃
⊢ potentialFunction net x k =
    ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x j).toReal +
        ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i'' j * (x i'').toReal * (x j).toReal +
      ∑ i : Fin n, if i ≠ i' ∧ i ≠ i'' then ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i j * (x i).toReal * (x j).toReal else 0

oSpec : OracleSpec ι
i : Fin (n + 1)
stmt : Sumcheck.Spec.Statement R n i.castSucc × ((i : Unit) → Sumcheck.Spec.OracleStatement R inst✝¹ n deg i)
transcript : FullTranscript ![(Direction.P_to_V, ↥(degreeLE R ↑deg)), (Direction.V_to_P, R)]
x : getType (Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.pSpec R inst✝¹ deg) 0
hp_i : ↑(transcript 0) ∈ degreeLE R ↑deg
hEq : transcript 0 = ⟨↑(transcript 0), hp_i⟩
⊢ (do
      let a ←
        ((OptionT.run (List.mapM (fun i => liftM (query (Sum.inr (Sum.inr ⟨0, ⋯⟩)) (D i))) (List.finRange m))).bind
                fun __do_lift =>
                __do_lift.elim (FreeMonad.pure none)
                  (OptionT.run ∘ fun evals => do
                    if evals.sum = Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.target R n i.castSucc stmt.1 then pure () else failure
                    (fun a =>
                          Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.mk R n i.succ a
                            (Fin.snoc (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.challenges R n i.castSucc stmt.1) (transcript 1))) <$>
                        liftM (query (Sum.inr (Sum.inr ⟨0, ⋯⟩)) (transcript 1)))).mapM
            fun {α} => (OracleInterface.simOracle2 oSpec stmt.2 transcript.messages).impl
      (fun a =>
            (a, fun i_1 =>
              @Prod.snd (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement R n i.castSucc)
                ((i : Unit) → Sumcheck.Spec.OracleStatement R inst✝¹ n deg i) stmt i_1)) <$>
          a.getM) =
    (fun a =>
        (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.mk R n i.succ (Polynomial.eval (transcript 1) ↑(transcript 0))
            (Fin.snoc (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.challenges R n i.castSucc stmt.1) (transcript 1)),
          stmt.2)) <$>
      if ∑ x, Polynomial.eval (D x) ↑(transcript 0) = Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.target R n i.castSucc stmt.1 then pure ()
      else failure

case left
R : Type
inst✝³ : CommSemiring R
inst✝² : VCVCompatible R
n deg m : ℕ
D : Fin m ↪ R
ι : Type
oSpec : OracleSpec ι
i : Fin (n + 1)
inst✝¹ : DecidableEq ι
inst✝ : oSpec.FiniteRange
target : R
challenge : Fin ↑i.castSucc → R
oStmt : (i : Unit) → Sumcheck.Spec.OracleStatement R inst✝³ n deg i
witIn✝ : Unit
hValid :
  ∑ x ∈ Fintype.piFinset fun i => Finset.map D univ,
      (MvPolynomial.eval (Fin.append challenge x ∘ Fin.cast (Sumcheck.Spec.relation._proof_11 n i.castSucc)))
        ↑(@oStmt ()) =
    target
⊢ (Prover.processRound 1
        { prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
              verifier :=
                Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝² i }.toReduction.prover
        (Prover.processRound 0
          { prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                verifier :=
                  Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝² i }.toReduction.prover
          (pure
            (@default (Transcript 0 (Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.pSpec R inst✝³ deg)) Unique.instInhabited,
              { prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                          verifier :=
                            Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝²
                              i }.toReduction.prover.toProverIn.input
                (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement R n i.castSucc × ((i : Unit) → Sumcheck.Spec.OracleStatement R inst✝³ n deg i))
                Unit
                ({ prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                          verifier :=
                            Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝²
                              i }.toReduction.prover.PrvState
                  0)
                (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.mk R n i.castSucc target challenge, oStmt) witIn✝)))).neverFails ∧
    ∀ (a : Transcript 2 (Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.pSpec R inst✝³ deg))
      (b :
        { prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                  verifier :=
                    Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝²
                      i }.toReduction.prover.PrvState
          2),
      (a, b) ∈
          (Prover.processRound 1
              { prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                    verifier :=
                      Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝² i }.toReduction.prover
              (Prover.processRound 0
                { prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                      verifier :=
                        Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝²
                          i }.toReduction.prover
                (pure
                  (@default (Transcript 0 (Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.pSpec R inst✝³ deg)) Unique.instInhabited,
                    { prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                                verifier :=
                                  Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝²
                                    i }.toReduction.prover.toProverIn.input
                      (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement R n i.castSucc ×
                        ((i : Unit) → Sumcheck.Spec.OracleStatement R inst✝³ n deg i))
                      Unit
                      ({ prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                                verifier :=
                                  Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝²
                                    i }.toReduction.prover.PrvState
                        0)
                      (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.mk R n i.castSucc target challenge, oStmt) witIn✝)))).support →
        (Verifier.run (Sumcheck.Spec.Statement.mk R n i.castSucc target challenge, oStmt) a
            { prover := Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.prover R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec i,
                  verifier :=
                    Sumcheck.Spec.SingleRound.oracleVerifier R inst✝³ n deg m D ι oSpec inst✝²
                      i }.toReduction.verifier).neverFails

hYY : Sₗ.Y ∩ Sᵣ.Y = y₀ ᕃ y₁ ᕃ {y₂}

⊢ S.D =
    (fun {X Y α} [Mul α] c r => Matrix.of fun i j => c i * r j) S.c₀ S.d₀ -
      (fun {X Y α} [Mul α] c r => Matrix.of fun i j => c i * r j) S.c₁ S.d₁

        (fun {X Y α} [Mul α] c r => Matrix.of fun i j => c i * r j) S.c₀ S.d₁ +
      (fun {X Y α} [Mul α] c r => Matrix.of fun i j => c i * r j) S.c₁ S.d₁

⊢ ∀ (j : Yₗ ⊕ Fin2Y),

⊢ ∀ (i : Fin2X ⊕ Xᵣ),
    S.D i = 0 ∨ S.D i = S.d₀ ∨ S.D i = -S.d₀ ∨ S.D i = S.d₁ ∨ S.D i = -S.d₁ ∨ S.D i = S.d₂ ∨ S.D i = -S.d₂

hS : S.IsCanonicalSigning
⊢ (▮S.c₀ ◫ ▮S.c₁ ◫ ▮S.c₂ ◫ S.Aᵣ).IsTotallyUnimodular

X : Sequent
W : Type
M : KripkeModel W
φ : LoadFormula
side : Side
B : List Sequent
next : (Y : Sequent) → Y ∈ B → LocalTableau Y
IH :
  ∀ (Y : Sequent) (a : Y ∈ B) {v w : W},
    (M, v)⊨Y →
      (M, w)⊨~''(AnyFormula.loaded φ) →
        ∀ (α : Program) (αs : List Program),
          α :: αs ≠ [] →
            relateSeq M (α :: αs) v w →
              (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes (α :: αs) (AnyFormula.loaded φ))).in_side side Y →
                (Y.without (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes (α :: αs) (AnyFormula.loaded φ)))).isFree = true →
                  ∃ Y_1 ∈ endNodesOf (next Y a),
                    (M, v)⊨Y_1 ∧
                      (Y_1.isFree = true ∨
                        ∃ F γ,
                          (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes γ (AnyFormula.loaded φ))).in_side side Y_1 ∧
                            relateSeq M γ v w ∧
                              (M, v)⊨F ∧
                                (F, γ) ∈ Hl (α :: αs) ∧
                                  (Y_1.without (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes γ (AnyFormula.loaded φ)))).isFree = true)
v w : W
w_nξ : (M, w)⊨~''(AnyFormula.loaded φ)
α : Program
αs : List Program
αs_nonem : α :: αs ≠ []
L R : List Formula
O : Olf
v_t : (M, v)⊨(L, R, O)
negLoad_in : (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes (α :: αs) (AnyFormula.loaded φ))).in_side side (L, R, O)
no_other_loading : (Sequent.without (L, R, O) (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes (α :: αs) (AnyFormula.loaded φ)))).isFree = true
u : W
v_α_u : relate M α v u
u_αs_w : relateSeq M αs u w
F : List Formula
δ : List Program
_in_H : (F, δ) ∈ H α
v_F : (M, v)⊨(F, δ).1
v_δ_u : relateSeq M δ v u
α' : Program
χ' : LoadFormula
α'_not_atomic : ¬α'.isAtomic
precons : ∅.Subperm L ∧ ∅.Subperm R ∧ some (Sum.inl (~'⌊α'⌋AnyFormula.loaded χ')) ⊆ O
B_def_apply_r_LRO :
  B = applyLocalRule (LocalRule.loadedL (⌊α'⌋AnyFormula.loaded χ') (LoadRule.dia α'_not_atomic)) (L, R, O)
⊢ ∃
    Y ∈
      endNodesOf
        (LocalTableau.byLocalRule
          (LocalRuleApp.mk ∅ ∅ (some (Sum.inl (~'⌊α'⌋AnyFormula.loaded χ')))
            (LocalRule.loadedL (⌊α'⌋AnyFormula.loaded χ') (LoadRule.dia α'_not_atomic)) precons)
          next),
    (M, v)⊨Y ∧
      (Y.isFree = true ∨
        ∃ F γ,
          (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes γ (AnyFormula.loaded φ))).in_side side Y ∧
            relateSeq M γ v w ∧
              (M, v)⊨F ∧
                (F, γ) ∈ Hl (α :: αs) ∧ (Y.without (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes γ (AnyFormula.loaded φ)))).isFree = true)

X : Sequent
W : Type

φ : LoadFormula
v w : W

αs : List Program

v_t : (M, v)⊨(L, R, some (Sum.inl (~'⌊a✝¹;'a✝⌋AnyFormula.loadBoxes αs (AnyFormula.loaded φ))))

  (match ~(⌊a✝¹;'a✝⌋AnyFormula.loadBoxes αs (AnyFormula.loaded φ)).unload with
    | Formula.bottom => false
    | ~Formula.bottom => true
    | ·a => true
    | ~·a => true
    | ⌈·a⌉a_1 => true
    | ~⌈·a⌉a_1 => true
    | x => false) =
    true

⊢ @Fin.dfoldl (↑i + 1)
      (fun i_1 =>
        FullTranscript
          (ProtocolSpec.compose (↑i_1)
            (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_5 (↑i + 1) i_1)
              (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ n))
            (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_5 (↑i + 1) i_1)

      (fun i_1 acc =>

            n (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ))

            (n (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ))
            (ProtocolSpec.compose (↑i_1)
              (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_6 (↑i + 1) i_1)
                (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ n))
              (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_6 (↑i + 1) i_1)
                (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ pSpec)))
            (pSpec (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ)))
          (ProtocolSpec.compose (↑i_1 + 1)
            (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_7 (↑i + 1) i_1)
              (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ n))
            (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_7 (↑i + 1) i_1)
              (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ pSpec)))
          (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_8 (↑i + 1) (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ n) i_1)
          (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_10 (↑i + 1) (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ n)
            (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ pSpec) i_1)
          (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.append
            (∑ i_2, n (Fin.castLE ⋯ (Fin.castLE (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_6 (↑i + 1) i_1) i_2)))
            (n (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ))
            (ProtocolSpec.compose (↑i_1)
              (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_6 (↑i + 1) i_1)
                (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ n))
              (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_6 (↑i + 1) i_1)
                (Fin.take (↑i + 1 + 1) ⋯ pSpec)))
            (pSpec (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ)) acc (T (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ))))
      (T (Fin.castLE ⋯ 0)) =
    @dcast₂ ℕ ProtocolSpec (@FullTranscript) instDepCast instDepCast₂ (∑ i_1, n (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1) + n i.succ)

          (fun i_1 =>

                (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_5 (↑i) i_1) (Fin.take (↑i + 1) ⋯ n))

                (pSpec (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ)))

                  (Fin.take (↑i + 1) ⋯ n))
                (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_7 (↑i) i_1)
                  (Fin.take (↑i + 1) ⋯ pSpec)))

                (n (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ))
                (ProtocolSpec.compose (↑i_1)

                  (Fin.take (↑i_1 + 1) (ProtocolSpec.FullTranscript.compose._proof_6 (↑i) i_1)
                    (Fin.take (↑i + 1) ⋯ pSpec)))
                (pSpec (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ)) acc (T (Fin.castLE ⋯ i_1.succ))))

B : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : Bicategory B
C : Type u₂
inst✝ : Bicategory C
F G H : LaxFunctor B C
η✝ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G
θ✝ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ G H
η : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G
θ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ G H
a✝ b✝ : B
f✝ g✝ : a✝ ⟶ b✝
⊢ ∀ (η_1 : f✝ ⟶ g✝),
    CategoryStruct.comp
        (Bicategory.whiskerRight (F.map₂ η_1) (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ b✝))
        (sorry g✝) =
      CategoryStruct.comp (sorry f✝)
        (Bicategory.whiskerLeft (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ a✝) (H.map₂ η_1))

B : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : Bicategory B
C : Type u₂
inst✝ : Bicategory C
F G H : LaxFunctor B C
η✝ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G
θ✝ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ G H
η : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G
θ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ G H
⊢ ∀ (a : B),
    CategoryStruct.comp
        (Bicategory.whiskerRight (F.mapId a) (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ a))
        (sorry (CategoryStruct.id a)) =
      CategoryStruct.comp (leftUnitor (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ a)).hom
        (CategoryStruct.comp (rightUnitor (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ a)).inv
          (Bicategory.whiskerLeft (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ a) (H.mapId a)))

B : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : Bicategory B
C : Type u₂
inst✝ : Bicategory C
F G H : LaxFunctor B C
η✝ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G
θ✝ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ G H
η : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G
θ : @CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans B inst✝¹ C inst✝ G H
a✝ b✝ c✝ : B
⊢ ∀ (f : a✝ ⟶ b✝) (g : b✝ ⟶ c✝),
    CategoryStruct.comp
        (Bicategory.whiskerRight (F.mapComp f g)
          (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ c✝))
        (sorry (CategoryStruct.comp f g)) =
      CategoryStruct.comp
        (associator (F.map f) (F.map g) (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ c✝)).hom
        (CategoryStruct.comp (Bicategory.whiskerLeft (F.map f) (sorry g))
          (CategoryStruct.comp
            (associator (F.map f) (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ b✝) (H.map g)).inv
            (CategoryStruct.comp (Bicategory.whiskerRight (sorry f) (H.map g))
              (CategoryStruct.comp
                (associator (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ a✝) (H.map f)
                    (H.map g)).hom
                (Bicategory.whiskerLeft (@CategoryTheory.Lax.OplaxTrans.vCompApp B inst✝¹ C inst✝ F G H η θ a✝)
                  (H.mapComp f g))))))

αs : List Program

tab : Tableau [] X
root_free : X.isFree = true
t : PathIn tab
W : Type
M : KripkeModel W
v w : W
v_t : (M, v)⊨nodeAt t
φ : Formula
side : Side
negLoad_in : (~''(AnyFormula.loaded (⌊α⌋AnyFormula.loadBoxes αs (AnyFormula.normal φ)))).in_side side (nodeAt t)
v_α_w : relateSeq M (α :: αs) v w
w_nξ : (M, w)⊨(~φ)
t0 : PathIn tab
IH :
  t = t0 →
    ∃ s,
      Relation.TransGen (cEdge X tab) t s ∧
        (satisfiable (nodeAt s) ∧ ¬cEquiv X tab s t ∨
          (~''(AnyFormula.normal φ)).in_side side (nodeAt s) ∧ (M, w)⊨nodeAt s ∧ (nodeAt s).isFree = true)

nbas : ¬Z.basic
ltZ : LocalTableau Z
nrep : ¬rep Hist Z

w_Y : (M, v)⊨Y
t_to_s1 : PathIn (tabAt t).snd.snd := ⋯ ▸ PathIn.loc Y_in PathIn.nil
s1 : PathIn tab := t.append t_to_s1
t_s : t ⋖_ s1
tabAt_s_def : tabAt s1 = ⟨Z :: Hist, ⟨Y, next Y Y_in⟩⟩
v_s1 : (M, v)⊨nodeAt s1

v_F : (M, v)⊨F

Fδ_in_H : (F, β :: βs) ∈ Hl (α :: αs)
Y_almost_free : (Y.without (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes (β :: βs) (AnyFormula.normal φ)))).isFree = true
⊢ (~''(AnyFormula.loaded (⌊β⌋AnyFormula.loadBoxes βs (AnyFormula.normal φ)))).in_side side (nodeAt s1)

ι : Type
oSpec : OracleSpec ι
Statement ιₛ : Type
OStatement : ιₛ → Type
inst✝¹ : (i : ιₛ) → OracleInterface (OStatement i)
pred : ReaderT Statement (OracleComp [OStatement]ₒ) Prop
hPred : ∀ (stmt : Statement), (pred stmt).neverFails
inst✝ : oSpec.FiniteRange
⊢ ∀ (a : Statement) (b : (i : ιₛ) → OStatement i),
    simulateQNeverFails (toOracleImpl OStatement b) (pred a) ⋯ →
      (simulateQ
            (SimOracle.statelessOracle oSpec ([OStatement]ₒ ++ₒ [fun i => (![] ↑i).2]ₒ) fun i q =>
              match i, q with
              | Sum.inl i, q => oracle (b i) q
              | Sum.inr i, q => oracle (FullTranscript.messages default i) q)
            (liftM (pred a))).neverFails ∧
        ∀ (a_2 : Statement) (b_1 : (i : ιₛ) → OStatement i) (a_3 : Statement) (b_2 : (i : ιₛ) → OStatement i),
          ∀
            x ∈
              ((simulateQ
                      (SimOracle.statelessOracle oSpec ([OStatement]ₒ ++ₒ [fun i => (![] ↑i).2]ₒ) fun i q =>
                        match i, q with
                        | Sum.inl i, q => oracle (b i) q
                        | Sum.inr i, q => oracle (FullTranscript.messages default i) q)
                      (liftM (pred a))).liftComp
                  (oSpec ++ₒ [Challenge ![]]ₒ)).support,
            a = a_2 → b = b_1 → a = a_3 → (fun i => b i) = b_2 → default = finZeroElim → a_2 = a_3 ∧ b_1 = b_2

      if α = 1 then @qRelativeEnt (d₁ × d₂) (instFintypeProd d₁ d₂) (fun a b => instDecidableEqProd a b) (ρ₁⊗ρ₂) (σ₁⊗σ₂)
      else

            @SandwichedRelRentropy._proof_2 (d₁ × d₂) (fun a b => instDecidableEqProd a b) (instFintypeProd d₁ d₂) α
              (ρ₁⊗ρ₂) (σ₁⊗σ₂)⟩
    else ⊤) =
    (if (↑σ₁).ker ≤ (↑ρ₁).ker then
        if α = 1 then @qRelativeEnt d₁ inst✝³ inst✝¹ ρ₁ σ₁
        else
          ↑⟨Real.log ((↑ρ₁).conj ↑(↑σ₁ ^ ((1 - α) / (2 * α))) ^ α).trace / (α - 1),
              @SandwichedRelRentropy._proof_2 d₁ inst✝¹ inst✝³ α ρ₁ σ₁⟩
      else ⊤) +
      if (↑σ₂).ker ≤ (↑ρ₂).ker then
        if α = 1 then @qRelativeEnt d₂ inst✝² inst✝ ρ₂ σ₂
        else
          ↑⟨Real.log ((↑ρ₂).conj ↑(↑σ₂ ^ ((1 - α) / (2 * α))) ^ α).trace / (α - 1),
              @SandwichedRelRentropy._proof_2 d₂ inst✝ inst✝² α ρ₂ σ₂⟩
      else ⊤

v₂ : d₂ → ℂ := fun y => ψ (a, y) / ↑√(∑ j, ‖ψ (a, j)‖ ^ 2)

α : Type
inst✝¹ : DecidableEq α
inst✝ : SelectableType α
s : BinaryTree.Skeleton
leaf_tree : BinaryTree.LeafDataTree α s
merkle_tree_cache : BinaryTree.FullDataTree α s
preexisting_cache resulting_cache : QueryCache (InductiveMerkleTree.spec α)
⊢ (merkle_tree_cache, resulting_cache) ∈
      ((simulateQ randomOracle (InductiveMerkleTree.buildMerkleTree α s leaf_tree)).run preexisting_cache).support ↔
    InductiveMerkleTree.QueryCache.toSet Unit (InductiveMerkleTree.spec α) () resulting_cache =
        InductiveMerkleTree.QueryCache.toSet Unit (InductiveMerkleTree.spec α) () preexisting_cache ∪
          BinaryTree.FullDataTree.toQueryCacheSet s α merkle_tree_cache ∧
      ∀ x ∈ InductiveMerkleTree.QueryCache.toSet Unit (InductiveMerkleTree.spec α) () resulting_cache,
        ∀ x' ∈ InductiveMerkleTree.QueryCache.toSet Unit (InductiveMerkleTree.spec α) () resulting_cache,
          x.1 = x'.1 → x.2 = x'.2

putative_root : α
cache_subset :
  BinaryTree.FullDataTree.toQueryCacheSet s α merkle_tree_cache ⊆
    InductiveMerkleTree.QueryCache.toSet Unit (InductiveMerkleTree.spec α) () query_cache
mem_support :
  (putative_root, query_cache') ∈
    ((simulateQ randomOracle
            (InductiveMerkleTree.getPutativeRoot α s idx (BinaryTree.LeafDataTree.getValueAtIndex s α leaf_tree idx)

                  let fold := Fold.fold_k F inst✝¹¹ ι S φ 1 inst✝ f vec_α;
                  let listBlock' := listBlockRelDistance 1 k fold S_1 C' hcode' δ;
                  ¬listBlock' ⊆ foldSet))
      True <
    ↑(errStar C' 2 δ)

F : Type

⊢ ∀ (r : Fin s → Fin m → F),
    ∀ δ ≤ 1,
      (∃ u u',
          ↑u ≠ ↑u' ∧
            ↑u ∈ relHammingBall (↑(smoothCode φ m)) f ↑δ ∧
              ↑u' ∈ relHammingBall (↑(smoothCode φ m)) f ↑δ ∧
                ∀ (i : Fin s), (eval (r i)) (mVdecode u) = (eval (r i)) (mVdecode u')) ↔
        ∃ σ,
          let w := fun i => X (Fin.last m) * (rename Fin.castSucc) (eqPolynomial (r i));
          let multiCRSCode := multiConstrainedCode φ m s w σ;
          ∃ g, g ∈ relHammingBall multiCRSCode f ↑δ

F : Type

⊢ ↑(do
          let r ← PMF.uniformOfFintype F
          pure
              (∃ σ,
                ∀ (i : Fin s),
                  let ri := GenFun r i;
                  let rVec := fun j => ri ^ 2 ^ ↑j;
                  let w := fun i => X (Fin.last m) * (rename Fin.castSucc) (eqPolynomial rVec);
                  let multiCRSCode := multiConstrainedCode φ m s w σ;
                  ∃ g, g ∈ relHammingBall multiCRSCode f ↑δ))
      True =
    ↑(do
          let r ← PMF.uniformOfFintype F
          pure
              (∃ u u',
                ↑u ≠ ↑u' ∧
                  ↑u ∈ relHammingBall C f ↑δ ∧
                    ↑u' ∈ relHammingBall C f ↑δ ∧
                      ∀ (i : Fin s),
                        let ri := GenFun r i;
                        let rVec := fun j => ri ^ 2 ^ ↑j;
                        (eval rVec) (mVdecode u) = (eval rVec) (mVdecode u')))
      True

          (↑(ρ code (@StirIOP.Params.φ M ι F P 0) (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams)))
          (↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist 0)) (@StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P 0) ∧
      ∀ {j : Fin (M + 1)} (hⱼ : ↑j ≠ 0),
        ↑(ε_out j) ≤
            ↑(StirIOP.Distances.l M Dist j) ^ 2 / 2 *
              (↑(StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j) /
                  (↑(Fintype.card F) - ↑(Fintype.card (ι j)))) ^
                s ∧
          let jPred := StirIOP.predFin (M + 1) j hⱼ;
          ↑(ε_shift j) ≤
              (1 - ↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist jPred)) ^ @StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P jPred +
                    err' F (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j)

                              j)))
                      (↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist j)) (@StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P jPred) +
                  ↑s +
                err' F
                  (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j /
                    @StirIOP.Params.foldingParam M ι F P j)
                  (↑(ρ
                      code (@StirIOP.Params.φ M ι F P j)
                        (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j)))
                  (↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist j)) (@StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P j) ∧
            ε_fin ≤ (1 - StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist ↑M) ^ @StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P ↑M

F : Type
inst✝³ : Semiring F
inst✝² : Field F
P_x P_y : Finset F
inst✝¹ : Nonempty { x // x ∈ P_x }
inst✝ : Nonempty { x // x ∈ P_y }
f g : Polynomial (Polynomial F)
a_x a_y b_x b_y n_x n_y : ℕ
quot_X quot_Y : F → Polynomial F
h_bx_ge_ax : b_x ≥ a_x
h_by_ge_ay : b_y ≥ a_y
h_f_degX : a_x ≥ Bivariate.degreeX f
h_g_degX : b_x ≥ Bivariate.degreeX g
h_f_degY : a_y ≥ Bivariate.degreeY f
h_g_degY : b_y ≥ Bivariate.degreeY g
h_card_Px : n_x ≤ P_x.card
h_card_Py : n_y ≤ P_y.card
h_le_1 : 1 > ↑b_x / ↑n_x + ↑b_y / ↑n_y
h_quot_X : ∀ y ∈ P_y, (quot_X y).natDegree ≤ b_x - a_x ∧ Bivariate.evalY y g = quot_X y * Bivariate.evalY y f
h_quot_Y : ∀ x ∈ P_x, (quot_Y x).natDegree ≤ b_y - a_y ∧ Bivariate.evalX x g = quot_Y x * Bivariate.evalX x f
⊢ ∃ q,
    g = q * f ∧
      Bivariate.degreeX q ≤ b_x - a_x ∧
        Bivariate.degreeY q ≤ b_y - a_y ∧
          (∃ Q_x, Q_x.card ≥ n_x - a_x ∧ Q_x ⊆ P_x ∧ ∀ x ∈ Q_x, Bivariate.evalX x q = quot_Y x) ∧
            ∃ Q_y, Q_y.card ≥ n_y - a_y ∧ Q_y ⊆ P_y ∧ ∀ y ∈ Q_y, Bivariate.evalX y q = quot_X y

F : Type
inst✝¹ : Semiring F
f g : Polynomial (Polynomial F)
inst✝ : IsDomain F
hf : f ≠ 0
hg : g ≠ 0
⊢ ((f * g).toFinsupp.support.sup fun n => ((f * g).coeff n).natDegree) =
    (f.toFinsupp.support.sup fun n => (f.coeff n).natDegree) + g.toFinsupp.support.sup fun n => (g.coeff n).natDegree

F : Type
inst✝ : Semiring F
f g : Polynomial (Polynomial F)
hf : f ≠ 0
hg : g ≠ 0
⊢ ((∑ i ∈ f.support, g.sum fun j a => (monomial (i + j)) (f.coeff i * a)).support.sup fun m =>
      m + ((∑ i ∈ f.support, g.sum fun j a => (monomial (i + j)) (f.coeff i * a)).coeff m).natDegree) =
    (f.support.sup fun m => m + (f.coeff m).natDegree) + g.support.sup fun m => m + (g.coeff m).natDegree

hsmooth : Smooth φ

hδ0 : 0 < δ
hδub : δ < 1 - 1.05 * √(↑degree / ↑(Fintype.card ι))
k : ℕ
hk : ∃ m, k = 2 ^ m
hk4 : 4 ≤ k
hF :
  ↑(Fintype.card F) ≤ secpar • 2 ^ secpar • degree ^ 2 • ↑(Fintype.card ι) ^ (7 / 2) / Real.log (1 / ↑(ρ code φ degree))

inst✝⁷ : Field F
inst✝⁶ : Fintype F
inst✝⁵ : DecidableEq F

ι : Fin (M + 1) → Type
inst✝⁴ : (i : Fin (M + 1)) → Fintype (ι i)
inst✝³ : (i : Fin (M + 1)) → DecidableEq (ι i)
n : ℕ
inst✝² : VCVCompatible F
ιₒ ιₛ : Type
s : ℕ
P : @StirIOP.Params M ι F
φ : (i : Fin (M + 1)) → ι i ↪ F
h_nonempty : ∀ (i : Fin (M + 1)), Nonempty (ι i)
hParams : StirIOP.ParamConditions F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P
Dist : StirIOP.Distances M
Codes : StirIOP.CodeParams F inst✝⁷ M ι inst✝⁴ (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P Dist
h_not_code :
  ∀ (f₀ : ι 0 → F),
    f₀ ∉
      StirIOP.CodeParams.C F inst✝⁷ M ι inst✝⁴ (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P Dist
        Codes 0
hδ₀Le :
  ∀ (f₀ : ι 0 → F),
    ↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist 0) ≤
        ↑δᵣ(f₀,
            StirIOP.CodeParams.C F inst✝⁷ M ι inst✝⁴ (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams)
              P Dist Codes 0) ∧
      ↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist 0) <
        1 -
          Bstar
            ↑(ρ code (@StirIOP.Params.φ M ι F P 0) (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams))
hδᵢ :
  ∀ {j : Fin (M + 1)},
    j ≠ 0 →
      ↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist j) <
          1 -
              ↑(ρ
                  code (@StirIOP.Params.φ M ι F P j)
                    (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j)) -
            1 / ↑(Fintype.card (ι j)) ∧
        ↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist j) <
          1 -
            Bstar
              ↑(ρ
                  code (@StirIOP.Params.φ M ι F P j)
                    (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j))
vPSpec : ProtocolSpec.VectorSpec n
inst✝¹ : (i : ιₛ) → OracleInterface (StirIOP.OracleStatement ιₛ (ι 0) F i)
oSpec : OracleSpec ιₒ
inst✝ : oSpec.FiniteRange
ε_fold : NNReal
ε_out ε_shift : Fin (M + 1) → NNReal
ε_fin ε_sound : NNReal
ε_rbr : vPSpec.ChallengeIdx → NNReal
⊢ ∃ π,
    ↑ε_fold ≤
        err' F
          (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams / @StirIOP.Params.foldingParam M ι F P 0)
          (↑(ρ code (@StirIOP.Params.φ M ι F P 0) (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams)))
          (↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist 0)) (@StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P 0) ∧
      ∀ {j : Fin (M + 1)} (hⱼ : ↑j ≠ 0),
        ↑(ε_out j) ≤
            ↑(StirIOP.Distances.l M Dist j) ^ 2 / 2 *
              (↑(StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j) /
                  (↑(Fintype.card F) - ↑(Fintype.card (ι j)))) ^
                s ∧
          let jPred := StirIOP.predFin (M + 1) j hⱼ;
          ↑(ε_shift j) ≤
              (1 - ↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist jPred)) ^ @StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P jPred +
                    err' F (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j)
                      (↑(ρ
                          code (@StirIOP.Params.φ M ι F P j)
                            (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P
                              j)))
                      (↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist j)) (@StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P jPred) +
                  ↑s +
                err' F
                  (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j /
                    @StirIOP.Params.foldingParam M ι F P j)
                  (↑(ρ
                      code (@StirIOP.Params.φ M ι F P j)
                        (StirIOP.degree F M ι (StirIOP.ParamConditions.deg F inst✝⁷ inst✝⁵ M ι inst✝⁴ P hParams) P j)))
                  (↑(StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist j)) (@StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P j) ∧
            ε_fin ≤ (1 - StirIOP.Distances.δ M Dist ↑M) ^ @StirIOP.Params.repeatParam M ι F P ↑M
